local_intent: Verify visibility and pose, align over the white_carton, then execute the top grasp pose with limited retries.
assumptions: Goal pose is expected to be available from an upstream ComputeGraspPose step.
coherence_with_global: Respects the global sequence by requiring PoseAvailable for goal_pose before GraspAtPose; aligns to target from above and attempts the grasp pose with retries, consistent with the grasp phase preceding gripper closure.
